A smile enlightened Creep's face.

Creep: Ah, you're the one I wanted to se=
e! [her arm shifts back to a
normal hand.] Call me Creep, will you? [She wa=
lk closer to Kratos.] It
looks like, for some reason, I have been brought h=
ere against my will.
Your lackeys have been threatening me since I came bac=
k. [She takes on
a hurt expression, like she is the victim.] They... They s=
cared me and
made me do things I didn't want to. Please, do something about=
 this! I
am just a small poor girl, you know...
